snippet.title: Grey Heritage: Noble Duty Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Grey Heritage: Noble Duty is an anime Tactical RPG. Follow Jaden, as he travels across the land and learns the truth about his country. Learn the origin of the war that leads to Grey Heritage: Faded Vision. Fight enemies in tactical combat and manage your army in this JRPG inspired journey!

Planned for release Early 2025!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BTrainStudio
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2424300/Grey_Heritage_Noble_Duty/
